Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.board.rooms

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.board.rooms.Square
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Target, java.io.Serializable
    public class Square
extends java.lang.Object
implements Target, java.io.Serializable
    The Square class. A square can be either a spawn square or a normal square, and based on this it has different properties.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Square​(int squareId, boolean spawn)
      Creates the square and initializes the distance map.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addPlayer​(Player player)
      Adds a player to the list.
      void addTool​(Card tool)
      Updates the tools list with new Cards.
      AmmoTile collectAmmoTile()
      This method does the "collect" action when the player is in a different square from a spawn-square.
      Card collectWeaponCard​(int id)
      This method does the "collect" action when the player is in a spawn square and he doesn't need to discard a card because he doesn't have three cards in his hand.
      Card collectWeaponCard​(WeaponCard playerCard, int squareCardId)
      This method does the "collect" action when the player is in a spawn square and needs to also discard one of the three cards in his hand.
      java.util.List<Square> getAdjacent()
      Builds a list of all adjacent squares.
      Square getAdjacent​(Direction direction)
      Gets the adjacent square in a certain direction.

      Gets the connection type in a given direction.
      java.util.List<Color> getCostOfCard​(int id)
      Searches in the tools list the card specified by the parameter and, if is able to find it, returns the list of Color corresponding to its cost.
      Square getCurrentPosition()
      Gets the current position.
      java.util.Map<Square,​java.lang.Integer> getMap​(boolean throughWalls)
      Gets the map of distances given the boolean key.

      Sets an adjacent square in a given direction.

      Sets a connection type in a given direction.
      void setRoom​(Room room)
      Sets the room to this square.
      javax.json.JsonObject toJsonObject()
      It adds every attribute necessary to identify this square to a JsonObject, and it also build two JsonArray for the players in the square and the tools.

      • collectAmmoTile

        public AmmoTile collectAmmoTile()
                         throws EmptySquareException
        This method does the "collect" action when the player is in a different square from a spawn-square.
        Returns:
        The AmmoTile in the square.
        Throws:
        EmptySquareException - If the Square is empty

      • getCostOfCard

        public java.util.List<Color> getCostOfCard​(int id)
                                    throws EmptySquareException
        Searches in the tools list the card specified by the parameter and, if is able to find it, returns the list of Color corresponding to its cost.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the card.
        Returns:
        The List of Color - the cost of the card.
        Throws:
        EmptySquareException - If the Square is empty

      • collectWeaponCard

        public Card collectWeaponCard​(int id)
                       throws EmptySquareException
        This method does the "collect" action when the player is in a spawn square and he doesn't need to discard a card because he doesn't have three cards in his hand. It throws an exception if the card isn't in this square.
        Parameters:
        id - The card the player wants to collect.
        Returns:
        The desired card.
        Throws:
        EmptySquareException - If the Square is empty

      • collectWeaponCard

        public Card collectWeaponCard​(WeaponCard playerCard,
                              int squareCardId)
                       throws EmptySquareException
        This method does the "collect" action when the player is in a spawn square and needs to also discard one of the three cards in his hand.
        Parameters:
        playerCard - The WeaponCard that the user chose to discard.
        squareCardId - The id of the card that he wants to collect.
        Returns:
        The desired card.
        Throws:
        EmptySquareException - If the Square is empty.

      • toJsonObject

        public javax.json.JsonObject toJsonObject()
        It adds every attribute necessary to identify this square to a JsonObject, and it also build two JsonArray for the players in the square and the tools. This method creates a JsonObject containing all the information needed in the View. The said JsonObject will add up to every other JsonObject of every other (necessary) class and will be sent to the view when needed.
        Returns:
        The JsonObject of the square.
